title: [GET] /caiwu/order/get-order-detail
description: 根据阿姨ID或order_code 获取订单详情
name: actionGetOrderDetail

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
"code": 40000,
"msg": "success",
"ret": {
   "151119032387067909": {
      "finance_order_code": "151119032387067909",            订单编号
      "finance_order_service_type": "1",                     服务类型
      "finance_order_service_type_name": "企业保洁",         服务类型(返回中文显示)
      "finance_order_worker_id": "5347",                     阿姨id
      "finance_order_service_at_begin": "0000-00-00 00:00:00", 服务开始时间(时间戳)
      "finance_order_service_at_end": "0000-00-00 00:00:00",   服务结束时间(时间戳)
      "finance_order_hour_count": "1.0",                       总工时
      "finance_order_money_unit": "0.00",                      工时单价
      "finance_order_status": "6",                             订单状态(返回数据库存储数字标识)
      "finance_order_status_name": "已完成",                    订单状态(返回中文显示)
      "finance_order_enterprise_contract_code": "BJ010000503",  合同号
      "finance_order_enterprise_name": "北京精彩乐现科技有限公司",  ---企业名称
      "finance_order_enterprise_address": "北京市昌平区上奥世纪中心写字楼a座1906",  --企业服务地址
      "finance_order_enterprise_contact": "郭芳芳",      企业联系人姓名
      "finance_order_enterprise_phone": "15210867662",  企业联系人电话
      "finance_ordergroup_id": "50"
    }
 },
"alertMsg": "成功"
}

title: [POST] /caiwu/order/get-order-detail-bycode
description: 传入订单编号一维数组，返回订单详情二维数组列表
name: actionGetOrderDetailBycode

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
"code": 40000,
"msg": "success",
"ret": {
     "151126032393731299": {
         "order_price": "0.00",                       订单单价
         "order_code": "151126032393731299",          订单编号
         "status": "6",                               订单状态
         "service_type": "1",                         服务类型
         "begin_time": "0000-00-00 00:00:00",         服务开始时间
         "finish_time": "2015-11-27 00:12:01",        服务结束时间
         "service_time": "1.0",                       总工时
         "pay_amount": "0",                           订单金额
         "worker_price": "0.00",                      订单结算单价
         "worker_id": "5716",                         阿姨ID
         "city_name": "北京"                          订单所属城市名称
         "create_time":"0000-00-00 00:00:00"          订单创建时间
     }
  },
"alertMsg": "成功"
}

title: [GET] /caiwu/order/get-order-detail-byfilter
description: 传入订单条件，返回订单详情二维数组列表
name: actionGetOrderDetailByfilter

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "code": 40000,
    "msg": "success",
    "ret": {
    "订单编号 order_code": {
    "id": "1",                                        --user_order表自增ID
    "create_time": "2015-11-23 13:22:46",             --创建时间
    "status": "6",                                    --订单状态：-1已取消，0初始化，2已指派，6已完成
    "is_service": "0",                                --回访阿姨是否服务 1已服务 2未服务
    "is_service_remark": "",                          --回访阿姨是否服务备注
    "user_id": "46",                                  --用户id
    "reserve_type_id": "50",                          --
    "address_id": "36",                               -- 地址id
    "service_type": "1",                              -- 服务类型
    "pop_channel": "BD下单",                          -- 推广渠道
    "order_src": "BD推广",                            -- 订单来源
    "reserve_time": "2015-11-19 15:00:00",            -- 服务时间
    "service_list": "4,22,23,24,25,30",               -- 服务列表
    "extend_admin_info": "",                          -- 备注信息
    "extend_info": "",                                -- 用户需求
    "address_type": "0",                              --
    "sort_right": "0",                                -- 排序权重
    "shop_id": "11",                                  -- 门店号
    "active_code_id": "0",                            -- 优惠码id
    "active_code": "",                                --
    "charge_reward_id": "0",                          -- 充值码id
    "worker_list": "",                                -- 阿姨列表，用来缓存查的
    "worker_num": "1",                                -- 需要几个人，数量
    "intent_card": "0",                               -- 办卡高低意向
    "recommend_worker_id": "0",                       --
    "is_used_worker": "0",                            -- 是否要常用阿姨，0不要1要
    "free_order_time": "0",                           -- 结算时免单时间
    "invisible": "0",                                 -- 阿姨端是否可见 0：可见，1：不可见
    "pay_way": "",                                    -- 支付途径
    "pay_account": "",                                -- 支付账户
    "pay_amount": "0",                                -- 支付金额
    "is_paid": "0",                                   --  0 未支付，1已支付
    "finish_time": "0000-00-00 00:00:00",             -- 结束时间
    "sms_type": "1,2,3,4",                            --  短信下发类型
    "is_response": "0",                               -- 是否有深度保洁 1 有0 没有
    "begin_time": "0000-00-00 00:00:00",              -- 开始服务的时间
    "city_code": "131",                               -- 城市代码
    "is_hidden": "0",                                 --  是否隐藏
    "lat": "0",                                       -- 订单坐标
    "lng": "0",                                       -- 订单坐标
    "second_phone": "0",                              -- 次要电话
    "pop_community_id": "0",                          -- 推广小区
    "street": "0",                                    -- 街道
    "place_detail": "",                               -- 具体地址
    "worker_wage_id": "0",                            -- 支付工人的 id
    "department": "",                                 -- 部门
    "qd_time": "2015",                                -- 签订时间
    "qy_manager": "张春明",                           -- 区域经理
    "zg_name": "刘永超",                              --主管姓名
    "bd_phone": "2147483647",                         -- BD电话
    "bd_name": "王垚",                                -- BD姓名
    "order_price": "0.00",                            --
    "worker_price": "0.00",
    "shop_price": "0.00",
    "service_time": "1.0",                            --订单时长
    "order_code": "151119032387067909",               --订单编码
    "is_supplemented": "0",                           -- 是否补单 0不是 1后台补单 2阿姨端补单
    "parent_id": "0"                                  -- 补单的父级订单
    "bill_id":"0"                                     -- 账单ID
    "customer_status":"0"                             -- 客户确认状态
    "worker_status":"0"                               -- 阿姨确认状态
    "operate_status":"0"                              -- 运营确认状态
    },
    "alertMsg": "成功"
    }

				"payment_channel": "支付渠道",
				"payment_mode": "交易方式:1=消费,2=充值,3=充值返现,4=退款,5=补偿，6=退押金",
				"payment_money": "交易金额",
				"payment_status": "支付状态",
				"payment_order_id": "支付订单号",

				"payment_memo": "备注",
				"admin_id": "管理员ID",
				"cash_back": "返现金额",

 	}
		"alertMsg": "成功"
}

                      "order_type": "订单类型"
             ]
         ]
     }
     "alertMsg": "操作成功"
 }
